aboutMe.description:
My name is Ramzi B, I am 24 years old, and I am a developer passionate about creating modern web and mobile applications.

My goal is to contribute to concrete projects that bring real value and simplify people's daily lives.

Through my professional experiences in companies as well as freelance collaborations, I have gained strong skills that I enjoy putting at the service of dynamic and creative teams.

Every project, every team, and every challenge has helped me grow, not only as a developer but also as a person.

For me, being a developer is not just about writing code.
It is primarily a work of collaboration, communication, and listening, which requires deeply understanding the real needs of a client and translating them into effective and innovative technical solutions.

motivation.description:
What motivates me in development is primarily the desire to create solutions that have an impact on people's lives.

My trip to Japan allowed me to meet people from all over the world, staying in hostels and sharing experiences with other travelers. These interactions opened my eyes to the importance of international collaboration and taught me to work with people from different cultures and backgrounds.

This experience now inspires me in my work: understanding the needs of others, collaborating effectively with diverse teams, and creating projects that bring people together and make their lives easier, regardless of their origin or context. Every project is for me an opportunity to take on a challenge and continuously learn.
